titleStmt.title: The vow breaker. Or, The faire maide of Clifton In Notinghamshire as it hath beene diuers times acted by severall companies with great applause. By William Sampson.
titleStmt.author: Sampson, William, 1590?-1636.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton and are to be sold by Roger Ball at the signe of the Golden Anchor in the Strand, neere Temple-Barre,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The vow-breaker, or the fayre maid of Clifton.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
